grid_data.help: ========================================= GRID naming convention ========================================= The long grid name has the order atm,lnd,ocn/ice,river,mask,glc The following shortname is used a% => atm, l% => lnd, oi% => ocn/ice, r% => river, m% => mask, g% => glc, w% => wav The notation is a%name_l%name_oi%name_r%name_m%mask_g%name_w%name Each grid is associated with three required elements and one optional element longname (a%name_l%name_oi%name_r%name_m%mask_g%name_w%name) shortname (for backwards compatibility) alias (even shorter notation than shortname) (optional) support (Description of the support level for this grid) (optional) Each grid can also be associated with the following optional attributes compset (Regular expression for compsets that are required to match for this grid) (optional)

grid.support: Non-standard grid for testing of the interpolation in DATM rather than coupler
Non-standard grid, for testing high resolution RTM grid

domain.desc: regional grid mask:

domain.name: gx1v6
domain.desc: gx1v6 is displaced Greenland pole v6 1-deg grid:

domain.name: gx3v7
domain.desc: gx3v7 is displaced Greenland pole v7 3-deg grid:

domain.name: tx0.1v2
domain.desc: tx0.1v2 is tripole v2 1/10-deg grid:

domain.name: tx1v1
domain.desc: tripole v1 1-deg grid: testing proxy for high-res tripole ocean grids- do not use for scientific experiments

domain.name: mpasgx1
domain.desc: mpasgx1 is a MPAS cice grid that is roughly 1 degree resolution:

domain.name: mpas120
domain.desc: mpas120 is a MPAS ocean grid that is roughly 1 degree resolution:

domain.name: oEC60to30
domain.desc: oEC60to30 is a MPAS ocean grid generated with the eddy closure density function that is roughly comparable to the pop 1 degree resolution:

domain.name: oEC60to30wLI
domain.desc: oEC60to30wLI is a MPAS ocean grid generated with the eddy closure density function with 30 km gridcells at the equator, 60 km at mid-latitudes, and 35 km at high latitudes. It is roughly comparable to the POP 1 degree resolution. Additionally, it has ocean under landice cavities:

domain.name: oRRS30to10
domain.desc: oRRS30to10 is an MPAS ocean grid with a mesh density function that is roughly proportional to the Rossby radius of deformation, with 30 km gridcells at low and 10 km gridcells at high latitudes:

domain.name: oRRS30to10wLI
domain.desc: oRRS30to10wLI is an MPAS ocean grid with a mesh density function that is roughly proportional to the Rossby radius of deformation, with 30 km gridcells at low and 10 km gridcells at high latitudes: Additionally, it has ocean under landice cavities:

domain.name: oEC60to30_ICG
domain.desc: oEC60to30_ICG is a MPAS ocean grid with initial conditions, generated with the eddy closure density function with 30 km gridcells at the equator, 60 km at mid-latitudes, and 35 km at high latitudes. It is roughly comparable to the POP 1 degree resolution. This version of initial conditions is spun-up from a G compset run:

domain.name: oRRS18to6
domain.desc: oRRS18to6 is an MPAS ocean grid with a mesh density function that is roughly proportional to the Rossby radius of deformation, with 15 km gridcells at low and 5 km gridcells at high latitudes:

domain.name: rx1
domain.desc: rx1 is 1 degree river routing grid (only valid for DROF):
domain.support: Can only be used by DROF

domain.name: r05
domain.desc: r05 is 1/2 degree river routing grid:

domain.name: r01
domain.desc: r01 is 1/10 degree river routing grid:
domain.support: For experimental use by high resolution grids

domain.name: r0125
domain.desc: r0125 is 1/8 degree river routing grid:

domain.name: mp120v1
domain.desc: mp120v1 is a MPAS ocean grid that is roughly 1 degree resolution:

domain.name: mp120r10v1
domain.desc: mp120r10v1 is a MPAS grid:

domain.name: gland20
domain.desc: 20-km Greenland grid

domain.name: gland10
domain.desc: 10-km Greenland grid

domain.name: gland5
domain.desc: 5-km Greenland grid (OLD VERSION: Generally use gland5UM instead)

domain.name: gland5UM
domain.desc: 5-km Greenland grid (new version from U. Montana)

domain.name: gland4
domain.desc: 4-km Greenland grid, for use with the glissade dycore

domain.name: mpas.gis20km
domain.desc: mpas.gis20km is a uniform-resolution 20km MPASLI grid of the Greenland Ice Sheet. It is primarily intended for testing.

domain.name: mpas.ais20km
domain.desc: mpas.ais20km is a uniform-resolution 20km MPASLI grid of the Antarctic Ice Sheet. It is primarily intended for testing.

domain.name: ww3a
domain.desc: WW3 90 x 50 global grid
domain.support: For testing of the WAV model

domain.name: ne0np4_arm_x8v3_lowcon
domain.desc: 1-deg with 1/8-deg over U.S. (version 3):

domain.name: ne0np4_conus_x4v1_lowcon
domain.desc: 1-deg with 1/4-deg over Cont. U.S. (version 1):

domain.name: ne0np4_svalbard_x8v1_lowcon
domain.desc: 1-deg with 1/8-deg over the island if Svalbard (version 1):

domain.name: ne0np4_sooberingoa_x4x8v1_lowcon
domain.desc: 1-deg with 1/4-deg to 1/8-deg over Sea of Okhotsk, Bering Sea, Gulf of Alaska to ARM-NSA site (version 1):

domain.name: oQU240
domain.desc: oQU240 is an MPAS ocean mesh with quasi-uniform 240 km grid cells, nominally 2 degree resolution:

domain.name: oQU240wLI
domain.desc: oQU240wLI is an MPAS ocean mesh with quasi-uniform 240 km grid cells, nominally 2 degree resolution. Additionally, it has ocean under landice cavities.:

domain.name: oQU120
domain.desc: oQU120 is an MPAS ocean mesh with quasi-uniform 120 km grid cells, nominally 1 degree resolution:

domain.name: oRRS15to5
domain.desc: oRRS15to5 is an MPAS ocean grid with a mesh density function that is roughly proportional to the Rossby radius of deformation, with 15 km gridcells at low and 5 km gridcells at high latitudes:
